title: A discourse of the religion anciently professed by the Irish and Brittish. By Iames Vssher Archbishop of Armagh, and Primate of Ireland
author: Ussher, James, 1581-1656.
publisher: Printed by R[obert] Y[oung] for the Partners of the Irish Stocke,
notes: Running title reads: Of the religion professed by the ancient Irish.
Usually found as part 4 of STC 24544 or 24544.5.
Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.
